word_mean: 〔Pierre Vernier，法国物理学家，1580～1637〕游标，游标尺：刻度精细的标尺，附于刻度较粗的标尺上，以在后者基础上测得较细量度

sentence.Network_en: Commonly, using a meta - key while dragging puts the mouse into vernier mode.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以在拖动操作期间按下元键,鼠标改变成游标模式.

sentence.Network_en: Any program that demands precise alignment must offer a vernier.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何要求精确对齐的程序必须提供精确滚动的游标工具.

sentence.Network_en: For precision manometes it is necessary to use vernier reading devices.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为精密的压力计,必须具有微调读数装置.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: named after Pierre Vernier (1580–1637), French mathematician

means.word_mean: 1. a small movable scale that slides along a main scale; the small scale is calibrated to indicate fractional divisions of the main scale
